00029 struct ip6_mh_opt_home_net_prefix_t {   /*Home netowork prefix option */
00030     __u8 ip6hnp_type;
00031     __u8 ip6hnp_len;
00032     __u8 ip6hnp_reserved;
00033     __u8 ip6hnp_prefix_len; /*prefix length for home network */
00034     struct in6_addr ip6hnp_prefix;  /*home address prefix */
00035 } __attribute__ ((__packed__));
00036 typedef struct ip6_mh_opt_home_net_prefix_t ip6_mh_opt_home_net_prefix_t;

00120 // Define the Proxy Binding Request message structure
00121 struct ip6_mh_proxy_binding_request_t {
00122     struct ip6_mh ip6mhpbreq_hdr;
00123     __u16 ip6mhpbreq_seqno; /* Sequence Number */
00124     __u16 ip6mhpbreq_action;
00125 /* Followed by Mobility Options */
00126 } __attribute__ ((packed));
00127 typedef struct ip6_mh_proxy_binding_request_t ip6_mh_proxy_binding_request_t;

00140     struct in6_addr src;
00141     struct in6_addr dst;
00142     struct in6_addr_bundle addrs;
00143     int iif;
00144     uint32_t msg_event;
00145     struct in6_addr mn_iid; /* MN IID */
00146     struct in6_addr mn_addr;    /* Full MN Address */
00147     struct in6_addr mn_prefix;  /* Network Address Prefix for MN */
00148     struct in6_addr mn_serv_mag_addr;   /* Serving MAG Address */
00149     struct in6_addr mn_serv_lma_addr;
00150     struct in6_addr mn_link_local_addr; /* Link Local Address  for MN */
00151     struct timespec addtime;    /* When was the binding added or modified */
00152     struct timespec lifetime;   /* lifetime sent in this BU, in seconds */
00153     uint16_t seqno;     /* sequence number of the message */
00154     uint16_t PBU_flags;     /* PBU flags */
00155     uint8_t PBA_flags;      /* PBA flags */
00156     ip6ts_t timestamp;
00157     uint16_t PBREQ_action;
00158     uint16_t PBRES_status;
00159 //Route optimization or flow control
00160     struct in6_addr src_mag_addr;   /* Source MAG Address */
00161     struct in6_addr src_mn_addr;    /* Source MN Address */
00162     struct in6_addr na_target;
00163     struct in6_addr ns_target;
00164     int is_dad;         // is NS used for DAD process?
00165     int hoplimit;
00166 } msg_info_t;
